about_the_game:
A long, long time ago, explorers discovered a dungeon in a desolate land. When they entered to explore, they encountered a large number of monsters. In the end, they were no match for the monsters in the tower and fell one by one. However, when they woke up, they found themselves unscathed, lying at the entrance of the tower.

After multiple attempts to explore, they found that the situation remained the same. Later, they named the tower after the first explorer who discovered it, calling it the "TOKIGEON" and publicized it to the world. This attracted countless adventurers to come and explore.

Welcome to TOKIGEON.

This is a rouguelike game, You need to defeat monsters to gain skills, build your skill combinations, and thus defeat stronger monsters!

During your journey, you will engage in different battles, obtain different rewards, and encounter different events!

There are 100+ skills, 50+ artifacts, and a variety of monsters and events waiting for you to experience.

We hope you have a fantastic and wonderful journey here.

Gameplay

Place different skills on the skill board, and through the different mechanisms and sequences of the skills, deal diverse damage to the monsters.

Skill Combination

Obtain three skills to combine them to upgrade skill and receive rewards.

name: TOKIGEON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 / Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (2GB VRAM) / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to TOKIGEON. This is a rouguelike game, You need to defeat monsters to gain skills, build your skill combinations, and thus defeat stronger monsters! During your journey, you will engage in different battles, obtain different rewards, and encounter different events!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
